content.text: 3 pounds ground beef
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "3 pounds ground beef" )

content.text: 17 saltine crackers, finely crushed
content.eamr: ( ing-1 "17 saltine crackers, finely crushed" )

content.text: 1/2 cup milk
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1/2 cup milk" )

content.text: 1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 1/2 teaspoons garlic powder" )

content.text: 1 1/2 teaspoons onion powder
content.eamr: ( ing-4 "1 1/2 teaspoons onion powder" )

content.text: 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper
content.eamr: ( ing-5 "1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper" )

content.text: 1 pinch salt, or to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 pinch salt, or to taste" )

content.text: 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
content.eamr: ( ing-7 "1/2 cup all-purpose flour" )

content.text: 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 tablespoon vegetable oil" )

content.text: 1 1/2 cups water
content.eamr: ( ing-9 "1 1/2 cups water" )

content.text: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed beef and mushroom soup
content.eamr: ( ing-10 "1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed beef and mushroom soup" )

content.text: 1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix
content.eamr: ( ing-11 "1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix" )

content.text: 0) In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, saltine crackers and milk.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the ground beef"@33:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "saltine crackers"@50:66 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "milk"@71:75 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Season with garlic powder, onion powder, salt and pepper, and mix until well blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "garlic powder"@15:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "onion powder"@30:42 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@44:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "pepper"@53:59 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "mix"@65:68 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until well blended"@69:87 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Line a 10x15 inch jellyroll pan with waxed paper.
3) Press the beef mixture firmly into the pan.
4) Cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate 8 to 10 hours, or overnight.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Cover"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-4-0 "plastic wrap"@14:26 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "refrigerate"@32:43 / AC
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "8 to 10 hours"@44:57 / DUR )
		:duration ( dur-4-1 "overnight"@62:71 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-5-0 "the oven"@11:19 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-5-0 "350 degrees F"@23:36 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-5-1 "175 degrees C"@38:51 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Remove plastic wrap from meat, and rub flour over the top side of the beef.
7) Flip out of the pan onto waxed paper, and rub flour on the other side as well.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Flip"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:source ( tool-7-0 "the pan"@15:22 / TOOL )
		:gol ( tool-7-1 "waxed paper"@28:39 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "rub"@45:48 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-7 "flour"@49:54 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "the other side"@58:72 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Cut into pieces (I use a pizza cutter).
9) Heat oil in a large heavy skillet over medium-high heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Heat"@-1:-1 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "oil"@-1:-1 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-9-0 "a large heavy skillet"@-1:-1 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-9-0 "medium-high heat"@-1:-1 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Fry the meat until browned on each side, turning only once.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Fry"@4:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "the meat"@8:16 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-10-0 "until browned on each side"@17:43 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:simultaneous ( ac-10-1 "turning"@45:52 / AC )
	)
)

content.text: 11) Remove to a 9x13 inch baking dish.
12) In a medium bowl, mix together the water, condensed soup, and gravy mix.
content.eamr:
( inst-12 / R
	:inform ( ac-12-0 "mix"@22:25 / AC
		:loc ( tool-12-0 "a medium bowl"@7:20 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "the water"@35:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "condensed soup"@46:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "gravy mix"@66:75 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 13) Pour over the meat in the dish.
14) Cover the dish loosely with aluminum foil.
15) Bake for 1 hour in the preheated oven.
content.eamr:
( inst-15 / R
	:inform ( ac-15-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:duration ( dur-15-0 "1 hour"@13:19 / DUR )
		:loc ( tool-15-0 "the preheated oven"@23:41 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 16) Serve fake steak and gravy with potatoes, rice, or noodles.
content.eamr:
( inst-16 / R
   :inform ( "Serve"@4:9 / AC
      :ppt ( "fake steak and gravy"@10:30 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( "potatoes"@36:44 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( "rice"@46:50 / FOOD )
      :ppt ( "noodles"@55:62 / FOOD )
   )
)
